 People laugh 😂 when they see a bald fat guy like me wearing Kitty Bluetooth Headphones 🐱 during virtual meetings. But you know what?  I wouldn’t have it any other way. 🙌 
 🎶 The Quest for The Ultimate Headphone 🎶 😔 
 My life was a never-ending loop of disappointment 😢. I tried 8 different headphones. EIGHT! 😱 Imagine the heaps of dollars 💸 that went down the drain.  
 Some had audio issues that made Beethoven sound like he was composing in a fishbowl 🐟. Others, connection so bad, it was like trying to stream Netflix 📺 on a 56k modem.

 Speaker diameter: 40mm Impedance: 32ohm±15% Sensitivity: 116dB±3dB Frequency: 20-20000Hz Mic sensitivity: -36dB +/- 3dB Mic impedance: 2.2kohm Directivity: Omni-directional LED working voltage: DC5V +/- 5% Working current: Below 100mA
